attributes.action: look at the health of aid workers abroad and particularly check VSO's evacuation procedures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are in crisis and distress whilst out of their normal environment -changing water supplies and differente diseases means many people get sick overseas, whether on holiday or at work. Please address this, P.M.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
